instructions: On your iPhone, open the App Store and search for " GoPro " to find the official app from GoPro, Inc. Tap Get to download and install the app. Once and installed, you'll need to pair your iPhone to your GoPro. It's easiest to do this when both devices are connected to the same Wi-Fi network, but you can also use a Bluetooth connection. A Wi-Fi connection is recommended, as it can provide a more stable connection. On your GoPro device, select either Settings > Connect or Preferences > Connect , depending on you GoPro model. On others GoPro models, the Connect option can be found by scrolling through the available Mode options. Select Pair or Pair Through the GoPro App . On your iPhone, open the GoPro App, then tap the camera icon on the main screen. Depending on the version of the app and GoPro, the app will either locate the GoPro and pair automatically, or it will pull up a list of devices. If the latter happens, tap your GoPro and the two devices will begin pairing.

Image titled Join a Zoom Meeting on PC or Mac Step 1 1 Open the Zoom meeting invitation in your mailbox. You'll receive an email invitation when you're invited to a Zoom meeting. Find and click the invitation email in your mailbox. Image titled Join a Zoom Meeting on PC or Mac Step 2 2 Click the invitation link in the email. If you have already downloaded Zoom to your computer, this will automatically connect you to the meeting . If this is your first time using Zoom, read on to learn how to download the necessary software to your computer. On some invites, you can find the link to join next to "Join from PC, Mac, Linux, iOS or Android" in the email's body text. This will open the Zoom website. Image titled Join a Zoom Meeting on PC or Mac Step 3 3 Click on "download here" if a download doesn't start automatically. If you're prompted, click Launch Application in the pop-up window. This will automatically prompt you to download the Zoom launcher to your computer. This will cause the "zoomuslauncher.zip" file to automatically download onto your computer. Image titled Join a Zoom Meeting on PC or Mac Step 4 4 Double click the downloaded file to install Zoom. This will open the contents of the "zoomuslauncher.zip" file. Click Continue , if prompted, to install Zoom. Image titled Join a Zoom Meeting on PC or Mac Step 5 5 Reopen your email and click on the meeting link again. This should automatically connect you to the meeting. If it doesn't, open the Zoom app that you just downloaded, click on Join a Meeting and enter the meeting link or ID. If the host has not started the meeting yet, you'll see a message stating "Please wait for the host to start this meeting" at the top. Image titled Join a Zoom Meeting on PC or Mac Step 6 6 Click the green button. This button should automatically appear once you join the meeting. It will connect you to the meeting with your microphone. Image titled Join a Zoom Meeting on PC or Mac Step 7 7 Click the button on the bottom-left (optional). This button looks like a video camera icon in the lower-left corner of the meeting window. It will allow the other participants to view your computer's camera. Advertisement
